example.name: Impolite visitors
example.text: [His visitors]-1 had crawled through the south fence and were crossing the meadow *PRO*-1 angling toward the house.

roleset.name: Cause to be/move in an angular fashion

role.descr: Entity now in an angled position/path of motion

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: She angled her lens out of the bushes so that she could get a shot of him.
example.arg: so that she could get a shot of him

predicate.note: Frames file for 'angle' based on sentences in ULA brown, Webtext 2.5-2. Verbnet entry 47.7. Comparison with 'swerve.'
